scripts.build:transpile: gulp --module form-footer --jsx && babel form-footer.jsx --out-file form-footer.js --source-maps && node-sass form-footer.scss form-footer.css
scripts.build: npm run build:transpile && npm run build:support && npm run build:deploy
scripts.build:render: npm run build:transpile && mjml render.mjml --output render.html
scripts.build:test: npm run build:render && npm run build:component && gulp --module test --visual
scripts.base: npm run clear && npm run base:render && npm run base:component
scripts.shot: npm run shot:render && npm run shot:component
scripts.pretest: npm run clear && npm run build:test
scripts.test:client: npm run shot && mocha test.visual.js --slow=5s --no-exit && mocha test.visual.js --slow=5s --no-exit --reporter=json > test.visual.json
scripts.construct: npm run pristine && npm run base && npm run build && npm run build:test && npm run test:client && npm run formal
scripts.deploy: npm run pristine && npm run build && npm run build:test && npm run test:client && npm run formal
